title: Compulsive car thief
creator_credit: Robert Anderson Associates and Robert Anderson
brief_description: Presents the case history of a 21-year-old prison inmate who has been stealing cars and getting caught since he was 10 years old, pointing out that his behaviour has continued to baffle his parents, and the court. Poses the question: is the psychopath a medical or legal problem?
